parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add a number to the score of a unit. This score is shown in multiplayer in the "I" ("P" in Arma 3) screen. Negative values will remove from the score. Server execution only. <br><br>
See also: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers#HandleScore]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addScore''' score

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> score: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>unit [[addScore]] 10;</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[score]], [[scoreSide]], [[addScoreSide]], [[getPlayerScores]]
</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Server execution only 
</value></part></template>
